data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Nacional get the game underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Nacional takes a corner from the right.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Claude Goncalves for Gil Vicente who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional.
In the minute 13, Claude Goncalves for Gil Vicente is back on the field again.
Nacional drives forward and Brayan Riascos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fabio Melo has awarded Nacional a corner.
In the minute 15, Fabio Melo signals a Nacional throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Gil Vicente.
Nacional needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Lucas Mineiro of Gil Vicente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fabio Melo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Nacional.
Gil Vicente have been given a penalty...
In the minute 22, Antoine Leautey is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Joao Talocha (Gil Vicente) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Gil Vicente pushes forward through Joel Pereira, whose finish on goal is saved.
Antoine Leautey is back on his feet again.
Nacional's Daniel Guimaraes is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 24, Fabio Melo has awarded Gil Vicente a corner.
In the minute 24, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniel Guimaraes.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Claude Goncalves's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Fabio Melo awards Nacional a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional are caught offside.
Gil Vicente takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 33, Gil Vicente push upfield and Antoine Leautey gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Nacional defence.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 36, Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Nacional takes a corner from the left.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 39, Fabio Melo awards the away team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick Nacional.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Fabio Melo has awarded Gil Vicente a corner.
Claude Goncalves (Gil Vicente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gil Vicente have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 44, Fabio Melo has awarded Gil Vicente a corner.
An attacking Gil Vicente player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Gil Vicente were awarded a penalty ... Which Lucas Mineiro failed to convert!
In the minute 45, Gil Vicente takes a corner from the right.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Nacional.
Ruben Fernandes (Gil Vicente) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Talocha of Gil Vicente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Vincent Thill (Nacional) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Rodrigao Prado heads Gil Vicente into a 0-1 lead.
Renan Oliveira instrumental with a fine assist.
Gil Vicente kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Fabio Melo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Joao Victor is replacing Vincent Thill for the home team.
In the minute 46, Nacional make their second substitution with Bryan Rochez replacing Larry Azouni.
In the minute 47, Fabio Melo signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Nacional's half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nacional takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Gil Vicente.
Free kick Nacional.
Antoine Leautey is booked for the away team.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Gil Vicente just outside Nacional's area.
Gil Vicente drives forward and Claude Goncalves gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio da Madeira.
Goal! Joao Camacho equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Ruben Freitas.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 60, Nacional pushes forward through Brayan Riascos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Gil Vicente.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 62, Joao Victor (Nacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fabio Melo signals a Nacional throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Antoine Leautey with Yves Baraye.
In the minute 66, Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 68, Claude Goncalves (Gil Vicente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Renan Oliveira.
Nogueira is on a sub for Claude Goncalves for Gil Vicente.
In the minute 70, Renan Oliveira, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Miullen is the substitute for Gil Vicente.
Brayan Riascos (Nacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Witi of Nacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 71, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Nacional's Bryan Rochez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio da Madeira.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 76, Fabio Melo has awarded Nacional a corner.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 78, Nacional takes a corner from the left.
Vladan Danilovic is on a sub for Ruben Micael for Nacional.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Fabio Melo has awarded Nacional a corner.
In the minute 79, Brayan Riascos (Nacional) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Fabio Melo awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Gil Vicente drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Nogueira (Gil Vicente) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Nacional to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Nacional.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Nacional make their fourth substitution with Kenji Gorre replacing Joao Camacho.
In the minute 88, Fabio Melo signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Fabio Melo awards the home team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente takes a corner from the right.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Ahmed Isaiah is replacing Lourency for the away team.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Bryan Rochez.
Great play from Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan to set up the goal.
